fields.Title of Presentation: A Systematic Comparison of Dam Breach Inundation Responses by HEC-RAS and GeoClaw Dam Failure Modeling Codes Applied to the Historic Teton Dam Failure
fields.Conference / Meeting Name: American Geophysical Union (AGU) Annual Fall Meeting
fields.Description/Abstract:
Abstract ID: 715328 
Abstract Title: A Systematic Comparison of Dam Breach Inundation Responses by HEC-RAS and GeoClaw Dam Failure Modeling Codes Applied to the Historic Teton Dam Failure 
Final Paper Number: NH015-0001 
Presentation Type: Virtual Poster Session 
Session Date and Time: Wednesday, 9 December 2020; 04:00 - 20:59 PST 
Session Number and Title: NH015: Miscellaneous Topics in Natural Hazards Science I Posters

IMPORTANT INFORMATION ON THE MEETING FORMAT

#AGU20 is scheduled from 1-17 December to accommodate over a thousand hours of virtual content to minimize conflicts while maximizing global engagement. The schedule has been extended over 17 days, excluding weekends, with breaks and time blocks for live events for global engagement. The meeting follows best practices for extended virtual meetings and global equity and inclusion. Scientific program content will be available on-demand, with pre-recorded oral presentations and virtual posters available for attendees to view and peruse outside of the scheduled live Q&A sessions during the meeting. The live sessions will also be recorded so they may be viewed on-demand after the session ends. Sessions are scheduled early and late in the day (PST) to encourage global participation.

Thank you for your contribution in making this virtual meeting engaging, important and dynamic!
